name: Gorgon
overview: Drift back to the days-long, long ago-when myths were reality and stories were truths. You have become Jason the Argonaut and your treacherous mission is to rescue the beautiful Golden Fleece. Be alert to the ruthless assaults of Medusa the Gorgon! Snatch the Golden Fleece and escape from her grip! Your castle awaits you. • Rescue the Golden Fleece! Beware of the ruthless Medusa!
